installer.title: RWDCBatchExpert+
installer.description: Installer for ILS Automation's Batch Expert+ for RWDC PnID

panel.title: ILS Automation Development Installer for Batch Expert+
panel.preamble: Install BatchExpert+ windows and tags for the RWDC 2KT project . The installation is for purposes of development and demonstration especially with regards to P&ID.

panel.title: Install Tag Definitions for RWDC
panel.preamble: This page creates memory-tag versions of user-defined-types for RWDC P&ID. The definitions are written to the "default" tag provider. These tags are for test/demonstration only.

panel.title: Install Instance Tags for RWDC
panel.preamble: This page adds unit tags for RWDC. The definitions are written to the "default" tag provider. NOTE: The base path specifies the path of the tag exports. It includes the provider.

panel.title: Install the RWDC Site-specific project
panel.preamble: Create Batch Expert+ 3.0 for RWDC P&ID screens.

artifact.name: BatchExpertRWDC30PnID
artifact.comment: Create a BatchExpert+ 3.0 project for RWDC with P&ID.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of BatchExpert+ in the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation and configuration of Batch Expert+ is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: The site-specific project currently inherits from a prior version of the Master. Update it to refer to the newly installed Master.
The tags have active components. A Gateway restart is required to accommodate the changes.
